meanings: (연락·연줄 등이) be in touch (with), have connections[contact(s)] (with)
walk wherever one´s legs carry one

vlive.korean: 조금 더 안전하지 않을까, 직접적으로 손에 닿는 게 아니니까 - 아니면... It'll probably be safer because you're not touching it with your hands. - Or... 듣기 View video GOT7 : 갓세븐 랜선 뒤풀이 굿바이더문🌕💚🐥
vlive.english: It'll probably be safer because you're not touching it with your hands. - Or...

vlive.korean: 얼굴에 닿는... That touch your face... 듣기 View video Apink : 야식먹방!!!
[마이크끼리 닿는 것도 봤어!] [I saw the mics touching!] View video V PICK! : [X1] <속보> 올림포스까지 날아오른 엑스원, 신들의 런웨이란 이런것🦋 (X1 talking about their concert spoiler)
[손 뻗으면 닿는 퍼즐] 왜 이렇게 많아? [They are within the reach of hands] Why are there so many? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.87
vlive.english: [They are within the reach of hands] Why are there so many?

vlive.korean: 굉장히 시각적으로 와닿는 것들도 있거든요. they conjure up a lot of visual imagery. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#36. 여기 어떤가요 (w. 정은지)
vlive.english: they conjure up a lot of visual imagery.

examples.korean: the sting of salt in a wound 발음듣기 상처에 소금이 닿는 따가운 느낌 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the sting of salt in a wound 발음

examples.korean: Have you got a pen handy? 발음듣기 네 손 닿는 데 펜이 있니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Have you got a pen handy? 발음

examples.korean: It’s impossible to get there in time. 발음듣기 거기에 시간 내에 닿는 것은 불가능하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s impossible to get there in time. 발음

examples.korean: They live miles off the beaten track. 발음듣기 그들은 사람의 발길이 닿는 곳에서 수마일 떨어진 곳에 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They live miles off the beaten track. 발음

examples.korean: I will do everything in my power to help you. 발음듣기 당신을 돕기 위해 내 기회[힘] 닿는 대로 모든 노력을 다할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I will do everything in my power to help you. 발음
